user_prompt:

You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.
Your task is to generate the appropriate text given the data information without omitting any field or adding extra information in essence called hallucination.

Dataset: webnlg

Here is the data, now generate text using the provided data:

Data: ['Nord_(Year_of_No_Light_album) | releaseDate | 2006-09-06', 'Nord_(Year_of_No_Light_album) | artist | Year_of_No_Light', 'Nord_(Year_of_No_Light_album) | recordLabel | Crucial_Blast', 'Nord_(Year_of_No_Light_album) | recordLabel | E-Vinyl', 'Nord_(Year_of_No_Light_album) | runtime | 58.41']
Output:
final_response: "Nord" is an album by Year of No Light, released on September 6, 2006. The album was issued by both Crucial Blast and E-Vinyl record labels and has a total runtime of 58.41 minutes.
